medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noticed intermittent left lower quadrant (LLQ) abdominal pain for the last few weeks. The pain sometimes migrated to the mid lower and right lower abdomen, lasting for several days before subsiding on its own. Recently, the pain increased in severity, lasting several days and associated with a low-grade fever of 100.3Â°F. Symptoms of incomplete bladder emptying have been present for the last 6 months to 1 year.
